meanings.definition: A very tall building with many stories
meanings.sent1: The skyscraper in the city was so tall that it touched the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The new skyscraper in town is a popular tourist attraction.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a tiny ant next to the massive skyscraper.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper stood like a giant among the other buildings.
meanings.sent5: The skyscraper loomed over the skyline, dominating the view.

meanings.sent1: The construction company decided to skyscraper the downtown area.
meanings.sent2: Many architects specialize in skyscrapering modern urban landscapes.
meanings.sent3: I wonder how long it takes to skyscraper a whole city!
meanings.sent4: She skyscrapered her way to the top of the industry with determination.
meanings.sent5: The team worked tirelessly to skyscraper the impressive structure.

meanings.definition: The act of constructing a skyscraper
meanings.sent1: The skyscraper's construction took years to complete.
meanings.sent2: Skyscrapering requires careful planning and skilled workers.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the fastest skyscrapering project was intense.
meanings.sent4: The city celebrated the successful skyscrapering of the iconic tower.
meanings.sent5: The art of skyscrapering involves balancing aesthetics and functionality.
